meanings.definition: regard something as being caused by someone or something
meanings.sent1: She attributes her success to hard work.
meanings.sent2: He attributes his good mood to the sunny weather.
meanings.sent3: The cat attributes the knocked-over vase to the mischievous dog.
meanings.sent4: The detective attributes the crime to the notorious gang.
meanings.sent5: The chef attributes the delicious flavor to the secret ingredient.

meanings.definition: a quality or feature regarded as a characteristic or inherent part of someone or something
meanings.sent1: Kindness is one of her best attributes.
meanings.sent2: Honesty is an important attribute in a friend.
meanings.sent3: The clown's biggest attribute is his ability to make people laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile is an attribute that lights up the room.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's speed is a remarkable attribute on the field.
